title: Couldn't find Live Captions in pixel 4L
content: I have just purchased Pixel 4L and set it up. I couldn't find Live Captions in the Settings (in Sounds section, as per instructions on Google community). As I'm hard of hearing, I would really like to access the Live Captions. How do I enable this function immediately?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4 XL
